title: AI-Collaboration-Based Science Assessment Design Innovation Course

context.prior_knowledge: At least three years of practical experience in a scientific field and elementary digital literacy
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based mobile learning environment, focusing on practical tasks applicable to real-world work settings

learning_goals: Learners develop the ability to evaluate the validity of AI-generated experimental designs according to scientific methodology standards
Learners can apply three or more ethical judgment criteria in the data analysis process using AI tools
After performing AI collaboration simulations in virtual reality environments, learners can demonstrate decision-making processes verbally or in written form

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
